attributes.action: Make it compulsory for yr9 and above to have school proms annually!
attributes.additional_details: I would like they government to take a step because school will not listen as it might not be in budget!
attributes.background: To contact schools and make it compulsory for every secondary school to have a prom!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about holding social events for students are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
